Articles.Content:
I haven't played KSP in a few months and I just came back to it after the upgrade to 1.2.2. I started up the game and was working on a mission. I noticed on the Launchpad that the COMMNET graphics showing antenna power, connectivity and network status were not showing. I thought it might have been something in my game so I did a fresh install and started a new career and it still was not showing up.

Am I missing something?

CommNet is an optional setting. For whatever reason, CommNet is turned off in your settings. That might be because you are loading a pre-1.2 savegame, or because your current game was set to have CommNet turned off when you started it.

To turn CommNet back on for your current game, go into the Pause menu/Settings/Difficulty Options and check "Enable Communication Network".
Adding on to what Bewing says, you can also enable more advanced options such as plasma blackout, require connection, and having only one ground station to connect to.
